page.title: 03HEALTH NETT'M & DISTRICT
page.content: _Nettleham health centre opened 13 years ago,is staffed by 5 doctors, 3 nurses,3 dispensers,4 receptionists, 1 practice administrator.The centre also deals with family planning, chiropody and speech therapy.Doctors give first aid at car crashes,lives having been pioneered locally. Nettleham folk collect medicine from the chemist,but the centre dispenses medicines for the surrounding district ventolin & anti biotics being in most demand.Security is necessary,with an alarm system,and a specially locked shutter for drugs.files are kept up to date for each patients visit.patients with broken bones go to the County Hospital for Xrays and treatment. Prenatal classes are given,most babies being born in the county maternity home.Nurses most frequently remove stitches,give injections and dressing.
